description: Receives raw audio event data (sound type, confidence, zone, timestamp), classifies the distress category (scream, glass break, aggression, medical distress), assigns severity level (Critical/High/Medium/Low), composes a structured alert message, and sends it to the appropriate Slack channel

example_response.distress_type: Classified distress category: Scream, Glass Break, Aggression, or Medical Distress
example_response.severity: Severity level: Critical, High, Medium, or Low
example_response.zone: Location/zone where the event was detected
example_response.alert_message: Formatted alert message that was sent to Slack
example_response.slack_status: Status of Slack notification: sent, failed, or pending
